Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.body

Class BodyXyLayer

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.changeNotification.ChangeNotifier
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.body.BodyXyLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChangeNotifierInterface, ChangeReceiverInterface, BodyInterface, Comparable<BodyInterface>
public class BodyXyLayer extends ChangeNotifier implements BodyInterface, ChangeReceiverInterface
This class represents a xy-layer. The xy-layer is defined by center and and its side lengths x, y, z.
Author:
Achim Zielesny

      public boolean isInVolume(de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace aPoint)
      Returns if a point in space is inside a body. NOTE: ModelDefinitions.OFFSET_FOR_COMPARISON_OF_NUMBERS is used in corrected quantities to avoid errors due to roundoff problems.
      Specified by:
      isInVolume in interface BodyInterface
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • fillRandomPointsInVolumeWithExcludingSpheres

      public void fillRandomPointsInVolumeWithExcludingSpheres(de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace[] aBuffer, int aFirstIndex, int aNumber, int aNumberOfTrials, de.gnwi.jdpd.interfaces.IRandom aRandomNumberGenerator) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Fills aNumber random points inside the body into buffer. NOTE: The volume of spheres within the xy-layer is excluded for the random points in aBuffer. NOTE: If number of trials is NOT sufficient random points may be located within the excluded volume of the spheres.
      Specified by:
      fillRandomPointsInVolumeWithExcludingSpheres in interface BodyInterface
      Parameters:
      aBuffer - Buffer
      aFirstIndex - First index in buffer
      aNumber - Number of random points for both buffers (not allowed to be less than 1)
      aNumberOfTrials - Number of trials for random point generation
      aRandomNumberGenerator - Random number generator
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if argument is illegal

    • fillRandomPointsInVolumeWithExcludingSpheres

      public void fillRandomPointsInVolumeWithExcludingSpheres(de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace[] aBuffer1, de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace[] aBuffer2, int aFirstIndex, int aNumber, double aStepDistance, int aNumberOfTrials, de.gnwi.jdpd.interfaces.IRandom aRandomNumberGenerator) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Fills aNumber random points inside the body into buffers. NOTE: The volume of spheres within the xy-layer is excluded NOT just for the random points in aBuffer1 and aBuffer2 but for all points along the straight line between aBuffer1[i] and aBuffer2[i] with the specified step distance. NOTE: If number of trials is NOT sufficient random points may be located within the excluded volume of the spheres.
      Specified by:
      fillRandomPointsInVolumeWithExcludingSpheres in interface BodyInterface
      Parameters:
      aBuffer1 - Buffer 1
      aBuffer2 - Buffer 2
      aFirstIndex - First index in buffer
      aNumber - Number of random points for both buffers (not allowed to be less than 1)
      aStepDistance - Step distance for points along the straight lines between aBuffer1[i] and aBuffer2[i]
      aNumberOfTrials - Number of trials for random point generation
      aRandomNumberGenerator - Random number generator
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if argument is illegal

    • getSimpleCubicLatticePointsInBuffer

    • getNonOverlappingRandomSpheres

      public LinkedList<BodySphere> getNonOverlappingRandomSpheres(int aNumberOfSpheres, double aRadius, int aNumberOfTrials, de.gnwi.jdpd.interfaces.IRandom aRandomNumberGenerator)
      Returns list with specified number of non-overlapping spheres at random positions that do NOT overlap with excluded spheres. NOTE: Returned spheres are added to this.excludedSphereList NOTE: If non-overlapping spheres could not be created with the specified number of trials possibly overlapping spheres are created. NOTE: The specified radius of spheres may be decreased if necessary.
      Parameters:
      aNumberOfSpheres - Number of spheres
      aRadius - Radius of spheres
      aNumberOfTrials - Number of trials for sphere generation
      aRandomNumberGenerator - Random number generator
      Returns:
      Linked list with non-overlapping spheres or null if none could be created
